channel.title: March Of The Peasents
channel.description:
I am working on a Machinima called March of The Peasents.. For those who don't know what a Machinima is: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Machinima]http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Machinima[/url].
I am planning on using a private server for most of the filming, and maybe use clips from a few other games.
Anyway, I need some help. I am completely new to this kind of thing, and have no idea how to get on a server that includes other people besides myself.
I need to know a good server to use. The only requirements I have are the ability to change clothes, hairdo, etc, and the ability to spawn items. Teleporting would be nice too. I would just use regular Moparscape, changing clothes (by talking to the lady) and changing other things will not work. I can't even talk to NPCs for some reason.
I'm sorry if I am posting this in the wrong place, I have spent hours browsing over the Moparscape forums, and can't find a more appropriate place to put this.
If you would like to do any acting in my Machinima, that would be good too. I need a few actors, because I can only be on one account at once (I believe.)
-Thanks.

item.description:
@Nayborish wrote:

[quote=“akisboy32, post:1, topic:116891”]nice idea dude…coool. never thought of it…ill ask you tom cruise to help act in it…

i can act…if you want…:P[/quote]
Yes, that would be helpful. I can’t work on it right now, because I can’t seem to figure out a server to use.

Read full topic
